ingredients: 1 quart 33% less sodium fat-free chicken broth
2 (15.5oz) cans S&W® Garbanzo Beans (Chickpeas), drained, rinsed
2 (14.5oz) cans diced tomatoes with basil, garlic and oregano (do not drain)
1/2 cup sliced pimiento-stuffed green olives or ripe olives
1/2 cup thinly sliced fresh basil leaves
